authors.author: Judson Van De Venter Winfield S. Weeden

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: I surrender all, newline I surrender all. newline All to Thee my blessed Savior, newline I surrender all.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: All to Jesus I surrender, newline All to Him I freely give; newline I will ever love and trust Him, newline In His presence daily live.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: All to Jesus I surrender, newline Humbly at His feet I bow, newline Worldly pleasures all forsaken, newline Take me Jesus take me now.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: All to Jesus I surrender, newline Make me Savior wholly Thine; newline Let me feel the Holy Spirit, newline Truly know that Thou art mine.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: All to Jesus I surrender, newline Lord I give myself to Thee. newline Fill me with Thy love and power; newline Let Thy blessings fall on me.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: All to Jesus I surrender, newline Now I feel the sacred flame. newline Oh the joy of full salvation! newline Glory, glory to His name!
